remarks: Lemma for ~ hsmex .  Combining the above constraints, along with ~ itunitc and ~ tcrank , gives an effective constraint on the rank of ` S ` .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)
statement:

hsmexlem4.u $e |- U = ( x e. _V |-> ( rec ( ( y e. _V |-> U. y ) , x ) |` _om ) ) $.
hsmexlem4.s $e |- S = { a e. U. ( R1 " On ) | A. b e. ( TC ` { a } ) b ~<_ X } $.
hsmexlem4.o $e |- O = OrdIso ( _E , ( rank " ( ( U ` d ) ` c ) ) ) $.
hsmexlem5 $p |- ( d e. S -> ( rank ` d ) e. ( har ` ~P ( _om X. U. ran H ) ) ) $.
